user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the PLEXOS Model specifications.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 using the 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' Scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate scenarios (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE) and years (2030, 2035, 2040, 2050) for decomposing annual demand into hourly profiles.

tasks.description: Split the nodes in the generated hourly hydrogen demand profiles.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the generated profiles, identify and split nodes into defined subsets.

tasks.description: Convert the split hourly hydrogen demand profiles into the TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, map the split profiles to the TST format template expected by the TYNDP study team.
